author: Associated Press
title: Residents of town north of Kansas City angered over hot-car death of police dog
description: Several residents of the town of 5,000 residents about an hour’s drive north of Kansas City posted that the person responsible for the dog’s death should face criminal charges.
content:
SAVANNAH, Mo. Residents of a small western Missouri town are saddened and angered after a police dog died in a hot car.
